snippet: One reason Burberry’s shares fell on Tuesday is that investors hate surprises. But the bigger issue is that the company said its creative director would also be chief executive, a dual role that might be an uncomfortable stretch.
abstract: One reason Burberry’s shares fell on Tuesday is that investors hate surprises. But the bigger issue is that the company said its creative director would also be chief executive, a dual role that might be an uncomfortable stretch.

headline.main: Negative Initial Market Reaction to Changes at Top of Burberry
